definition: to inject/to pour into/to concentrate/to pay attention/stake (gambling)/classifier for sums of money/variant of 註|注[zhu4]
see 注射針|注射针[zhu4 she4 zhen1]

sentences.english: He was getting through games last season on painkilling injections.
sentences.chinese: 去季他都是在注射止痛劑的情況下堅持上場的。

sentences.english: This approach created for the treatment of induration after intramuscular injection is also very effective.
sentences.chinese: 用於創建硬化治療後，這種做法肌肉注射也很有效。

sentences.english: Use a syringe device to gently direct water against the wall of the ear canal.
sentences.chinese: 使用注射器直接向耳孔壁注水。

sentences.english: Lancers and dancers pass a poisoned syringe.
sentences.chinese: 槍騎兵和舞者經過一次被投毒的注射。

sentences.english: An iodine-based contrast is injected into the bloodstream and watched as it travels around.
sentences.chinese: 注射到血液中碘的對比，看着它旅行左右。

sentences.english: The utility model change-oriented organizations involved in the injection molding machine injection devices.
sentences.chinese: 本實用新型涉及改變導向機構的注塑機的注射裝置。

sentences.english: Injecting drug in a short period would be more effective if MEC is relatively high.
sentences.chinese: MEC較大時，比較適合採用短時間集中注射方式。

sentences.english: The content of etoposide injection was determined by first order derivative spectrophotometry.
sentences.chinese: 用一階導數光譜法測定足葉乙甙注射液的含量。

sentences.english: The children were vaccinated against cholera.
sentences.chinese: 那些小孩接受了霍亂預防注射。

sentences.english: The gel would probably be injected after the scar tissue has been surgically removed.
sentences.chinese: 這種凝膠可能會在手術摘除疤痕組織後注射。

sentences.english: The principle of a stand-up dynamic vibration injection machine is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了立式液壓振動注射機的工作原理。

sentences.english: Drug and non-intravenous drug users in these two lines of defense is extremely fragile.
sentences.chinese: 戒毒和不靜脈注射毒品這兩道防線是極其脆弱的。

sentences.english: Vitamin injections in any case do not help tortoises to survive hibernation.
sentences.chinese: 維生素注射在任何情況下對龜龜冬眠是沒有幫助的。

sentences.english: Diabetic mouse models were established by intravenous injection of alloxan tetrahydrate.
sentences.chinese: 四氧嘧啶尾靜脈注射製作糖尿病小鼠模型。

sentences.english: Structures around the nerve was not seen damaged.
sentences.chinese: 局部注射區軟組織及頦孔周圍骨質未見壞死。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To investigate the effect of butyl rubber stopper on the stability of procaine hydrochloride injection.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究丁基橡膠塞對普魯卡因注射液穩定性的影響。

definition: fluid loaded into a syringe for a hypodermic injection
to take medicine orally/oral (contraceptive etc)/to say that one is convinced
